name: Interstellar annihilation project
description:
A simple shooting game.

Your friends invite you to visit their alien base. When you arrive, you will find that there are layers of monsters around the base. When your friends see you coming, they ask for help and hope you can save them.

You can:

Find a nearby astronaut with some weapons around him. Pick up these weapons and kill monsters in the distance.

Of course, you are very dissatisfied with the serious shortage of ammunition. Please look around, find the weapon and come again to kill the monster.

When there are no monsters in the whole base, you can enjoy the scenery and visit the base carefree!

Kill the enemy or all the characters in front of you.

Enemy types: fast moving characters and immovable characters.

Operation mode

Right click the target

WASD controls motion

Left mouse button attack

Mouse control direction

E loading weapons
